#Wczytanie danych i wyświetlenie
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
data <- read_csv("apartments_rent_pl_2024_06.csv")
spec(data)

```

# Brakujące obserwacje

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
vis_dat(data, palette = "cb_safe")

```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
vis_miss(data)
```

# Czyszczenie danych
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
nrow(data[complete.cases(data), ])/nrow(data)*100
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
RULE <- editset(c("squareMeters > 0", "rooms > 0","latitude > 0","buildYear > 0", "price > 0","hasParkingSpace %in% c('yes','no')", "hasBalcony %in% c('yes','no')", "hasElevator %in% c('yes','no')", "hasSecurity %in% c('yes','no')", "hasStorageRoom %in% c('yes','no')" ))
RULE

```

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
violated <- violatedEdits(RULE, data)
summary(violated)
```

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
plot(violated)
```
